metadata.title: Section 354A IPC – Sexual Harassment
metadata.text: Any unwelcome sexually coloured remarks or repeated attempts to contact a person electronically may fall under sexual harassment laws.

metadata.title: Section 503 IPC – Criminal Intimidation
metadata.text: Whoever threatens another with injury to person, reputation or property with intent to cause alarm commits criminal intimidation.

metadata.title: Section 66E IT Act – Violation of Privacy
metadata.text: Capturing, publishing or transmitting images of a private area of any person without consent is punishable under the IT Act.
